dict.acceptation: 叙述(relate过去式和过去分词)；

sent.orig: Objective: To study the biology function of novel HBRP(Human BSP-Related Protein) gene.
sent.trans: 目的：研究新基因HBRP(Human BSP-Related Protein)的生物学功能。

sent.orig: Various risk factors for post-ERCP pancreatitis have now been recognized including patient-related, procedure-related, and operator-related factors.
sent.trans: 现在公认的ERCP术后胰腺炎不同的危险因子包括患者相关的、操作相关的和术者相关的因素。

sent.orig: Diploma or Bachelor degree, with related work experiences in Project Management or related field.
sent.trans: 大学本科学历，在项目管理或相关领域有一定工作经验。

sent.orig: Investigates all related accidents and employee relations. Handles related first step employee relations problems.
sent.trans: 调查所有相关的事故和员工关系。

sent.orig: Maynard has personally experienced many fingerprint-related snafus, often related to employment.
sent.trans: 梅纳德自己经历了数次与指纹相关的麻烦，通常是因为求职。
